allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement real custom domain mapping with DNS verification

- Add Firebase Hosting domain API functions (addCustomDomain, getDomainStatus, removeCustomDomainFromHosting)
- Add real DNS verification using Node.js dns module (TXT, A, CNAME record lookups)
- Update verifyDomain to perform actual DNS checks before registering with Firebase Hosting
- Update checkDomainStatus to poll real SSL certificate status from Firebase Hosting API
- Update removeCustomDomain to also remove domain from Firebase Hosting
- Update Node.js runtime to 20 (was 18, deprecated)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Remove AI branding, add logo, enhance brand DNA analysis

- Remove all specific AI tool mentions \(Gemini, Nano Banana, Veo\) from UI
- Replace "RMS" text logo with new gold icon image across all pages
- Add two-step brand analysis: extract logo URL then analyze colors from logo
- Add website detection badges \(Has Website/No Website\) to lead cards
- Add existingWebsiteUrl field to Lead interface for tracking business websites
- Update ServiceCatalog source from "Gemini 3 Pro" to "AI Engine"

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
